text:
Steps to reproduce 
1) use Tomcat Web Application Manager 
2) stop e.g. /jsp-examples 
3) try to undeploy it 
4) you'll get a message 
 
FAIL - Encountered exception LifecycleException:  Container 
org.apache.catalina.core.ContainerBase.[Catalina].[localhost].[/jsp-examples] 
has not been started
creator: sherold@netbeans.org
remm@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 32729 ***
